[source](https://github.com/jedmao/queso/blob/master/src/packages/kebab-case/kebabCase.ts)

Converts a string value into [kebab case](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kebab_case).

## Parameters

| Name    | Type     | Description            |
| :------ | :------- | :--------------------- |
